title.rendered: Visit us at the 2020 American Society of Cataract & Refractive Surgery

content.rendered: We will be attending the 2020 American Society of Cataract and Refractive Surgery at booth #450 in the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center this year. Visit our booth for ASCRS discounts on all of our products, and to enter our raffle for a daily chance to win free products and big discounts!

excerpt.rendered: We will be attending the 2020 American Society of Cataract and Refractive Surgery at booth #450 in the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center this year.
